visits.text: Discovery of Gamcheon Culture Village and its colorful murals
Visit to Haedong Yonggungsa Temple by the sea
Discovery of Jaman Mural Village and its colorful frescoes.
Stroll through Jeonju Hanok Village and visit to Gyeonggijeon Shrine.
Exploration of Haedong Yonggungsa Temple, perched on sea cliffs.
Visit to Gamcheon Culture Village, colorful maze of artistic alleys.
Walk on Haeundae Beach, Busan's most famous beach.

activities.text: Walk on Haeundae Beach and sunset watching
Tasting of traditional bibimbap, Jeonju's specialty.
Train journey to Busan (approximately 3h with connection).
Evening walk in Nampo-dong district and at Jagalchi Market.
Tasting of fresh seafood at Jagalchi Market stalls.

visits.text: Visit to the royal tombs of Daereungwon
Exploration of Bulguksa Temple, UNESCO World Heritage site
Discovery of the pink grass of Gyeongju

activities.text: Walk in the historic center of Gyeongju

days_plan.itin_title: South Korea Road Trip: Seoul, Temples and Jeju Island Heritage

visits.text: Discovery of the traditional village of Jeonju Hanok Village
Visit to Gyeonggijeon Shrine and its gardens
Visit to Gyeongbokgung palace and its gardens, with the national folk museum.
Discovery of UNESCO-listed Changdeokgung palace and the adjacent Changgyeonggung.
Break at Jeongdong Observatory to admire the view of Deoksugung and downtown.
Visit to Deoksugung palace and its historical reconstruction from the imperial era.

activities.text: Trying on a traditional hanbok for cultural immersion
KTX train journey to Jeonju, about 2h30.

visits.text: Discovery of Gyeongbokgung palace and its gardens
Walk in the traditional district of Bukchon Hanok Village
Panoramic view from N Seoul Tower on Mount Namsan
Discovery of Gwangjang market and tasting of local specialties
Hike on the Jungnang Trail to Mount Yongmasan
Visit to the Starfield COEX library
Korean cooking class to learn traditional dishes
Stroll and shopping in Myeongdong
Trip to Everland amusement park
Unusual activity of engraving a personal seal (dojang)
Walk along the Han River and relaxation in the surrounding parks
Night walk around Heunginjimun Gate and Dongdaemun Design Plaza, discovering Seoul's ancient walls.
Exploration of Gwangjang Market, famous for its street food stalls and artisanal products.
Visit to Eunpyeong Hanok Village, a traditional village surrounded by mountains.
Discovery of Jinkwansa temple and participation in a local Buddhist ceremony.
Sunset from Seoul Sky observatory at the top of Lotte World Tower.
Walk in the Gangnam district: Gangnam Style statue, Starfield library, Bongeunsa temple and Rodeo Street.

activities.text: Evening stroll in Insadong for artisan shops
Night stroll along the Cheonggyecheon Stream
Exploration of the modern Gangnam district
Discovery of Jogyesa Temple in the city center
Relaxing evening in a jjimjilbang (Korean spa)
Last shopping in Namdaemun and Dongdaemun markets
Tasting traditional dishes like yukhoe and bindaetteok in the alleys of Gwangjang Market.
Experience of local gastronomy with Korean barbecue in Gangnam.
